choice.title: Set up Environment
choice.description: Creates iOSOpenDev filesystem structure and modifies Bash personal initialization file.

choice.title: iOSOpenDev Command-line Tool (iosod)
choice.description: iOSOpenDev's command-line tool (iosod) that is used by Xcode during Build Phases for projects created from iOSOpenDev templates. Also, open Terminal and type `iosod --help` to see other usages it provides.

choice.title: Set up latest iOS SDK
choice.description: Sets up the latest iOS SDK to allow "open" development in Xcode of jailbreak-type projects not supported nor allowed by default.

choice.title: Xcode Templates
choice.description: Individual Xcode templates for building Action Menu Plugin, Activator Listener, AssistantExtensions Extension, Command-line Tool, Dynamic Library, NotificationCenter Widget, SBSettings Toggle and Substrate Tweak. Each template includes ability to build its correctly structured Debian package for submission to Cydia or other APT repository.

choice.title: 3rd Party Header and Library Files
choice.description: Downloads 3rd party header and library files: ActionMenu, AssistantExtensions, CaptainHook, LibActivator and MobileSubstrate.

choice.title: Depenency Tools
choice.description: Downloads class-dump and class-dump-z for generating SDK header files and ldid for "signing" code.

choice.title: Dump SDK Header Files
choice.description: Generates (or "dumps") latest iOS SDK public and private framework and SpringBoard header files. This may take 5-15 minutes to perform. Please be patient.

locale.resource:
{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252\cocoartf1138\cocoasubrtf320 {\fonttbl\f0\fnil\fcharset0 LucidaGrande;} {\colortbl;\red255\green255\blue255;\red255\green0\blue0;} \pard\tx560\tx1120\tx1680\tx2240\tx2800\tx3360\tx3920\tx4480\tx5040\tx5600\tx6160\tx6720\pardirnatural\qc
\f0\b\fs30 \cf0 *** IMPORTANT INFORMATION *** \b0\fs26 \ \pard\tx560\tx1120\tx1680\tx2240\tx2800\tx3360\tx3920\tx4480\tx5040\tx5600\tx6160\tx6720\pardirnatural \cf0 \ \pard\tx560\tx1120\tx1680\tx2240\tx2800\tx3360\tx3920\tx4480\tx5040\tx5600\tx6160\tx6720\pardirnatural
\b \cf2 The dpkg-deb tool must be installed before continuing. \b0 \cf0 \ \ If MacPorts is installed:\ \'95 In Terminal, run: `sudo port -f install dpkg`\ \ If MacPorts is not installed:\ \'95 Download it from {\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "http://www.macports.org/"}}{\fldrslt http://www.macports.org/}}.\ \'95 Run its installer it.\ \'95 Log out and back in (maybe even a reboot is needed).\ \'95 Install dpkg as directed above.\ \ Note: Fink's dpkg-deb is known to give errors.\ \
\b \cf2 The `Dump SDK Header Files` option adds 5-15 minutes to the installation process. Please be patient. \b0 \cf0 \ \ The dumping of header files can be skipped and performed later with the `iosod` command-line tool. After installation, in Terminal, type `iosod --help` for usage.\ }

{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252\cocoartf1138\cocoasubrtf320 {\fonttbl\f0\fnil\fcharset0 LucidaGrande;} {\colortbl;\red255\green255\blue255;} \pard\tx560\tx1120\tx1680\tx2240\tx2800\tx3360\tx3920\tx4480\tx5040\tx5600\tx6160\tx6720\pardirnatural
\f0\fs26 \cf0 iOSOpenDev sets up the latest iOS SDK to allow "open" development in Xcode of jailbreak-type projects not supported nor allowed by default. iOSOpenDev also provides Xcode templates for building common jailbreak-type projects and the various tools needed for such development.\ \ Follow\'97 https://twitter.com/@kokoabim\ Visit\'97 http://iOSOpenDev.com\ Wiki\'97 https://github.com/kokoabim/iOSOpenDev/wiki\ Code\'97 https://github.com/kokoabim/iOSOpenDev\ Contact\'97 dev@iosopendev.com}
